docs.snippet: Winslow Homers in the shadow of a defunct Beech-Nut baby food plant. A Rembrandt, Picasso, Rubens and Renoir up the hill from a paper mill. The founder of the Hudson River School vying for attention amid baseball memorabilia and old farm machinery...
docs.lead_paragraph: Winslow Homers in the shadow of a defunct Beech-Nut baby food plant. A Rembrandt, Picasso, Rubens and Renoir up the hill from a paper mill. The founder of the Hudson River School vying for attention amid baseball memorabilia and old farm machinery.

docs.snippet: The green jacket hardly left Bubba Watson's closet the first time he won the Masters. Already in the last three weeks, he has worn it to a hometown function for kids, to the University of Georgia, and even had it on when he threw out the first pit...
docs.lead_paragraph: The green jacket hardly left Bubba Watson's closet the first time he won the Masters. Already in the last three weeks, he has worn it to a hometown function for kids, to the University of Georgia, and even had it on when he threw out the first pitch in a minor league baseball game.

headline.main: The Bubba Tour Focuses on Schools and Inspiration
headline.print_headline: The Bubba Tour Focuses on Schools and Inspiration

docs.snippet: A nonprofit organization founded to help improve education in science, technology, engineering and mathematics is working with schools to expand the success of advanced placement classes....
docs.lead_paragraph: A nonprofit organization founded to help improve education in science, technology, engineering and mathematics is working with schools to expand the success of advanced placement classes.
docs.abstract: Increasing number of high schools are pushing to expand reach and success of Advanced Placement classes, seeking to draw both average and above average students, as part of collaboration with the National Math and Science Initiative; NMSI, nonprofit organization founded in 2007 to help improve science education, combines teacher training with student study sessions and cash incentives to reach its goals.

headline.main: Spreading the A.P. Gospel to Nurture Scientists and Engineers
headline.print_headline: A Way to Spread the A.P. Gospel
